Work_Experience_QualificationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Work_Experience_QualificationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Work_Experience_QualificationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Work_Experience_Skill_Data.description: The description of the Work Experience Skill.
The order in which the Work Experience will show on a page or Talent Card.
Indicates whether or not this work experience is active in the system.

Work_Experience_RatingObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Work_Experience_RatingObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Work_Experience_RatingObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Work_Experience_Rating_Data.description: The name of the Work Experience Rating.
The value of the Work Experience Rating that indicates the order in which the rating displays.
The description of the Work Experience Rating.
Indicates whether or not this work experience rating is active in the system.

Work_Experience_Skill_Data.description: The encapsulating element for Work Experience Rating data.

description: The encapsulating element for Work Experience Skill data.

validation.validation: Work Experience Description field must be unique.
